name: Virus Killer (ONSoft)
description:
Virus Killer is an interesting and different game is a new 2020 game you should try.

Doctors are our heroes who fight against viruses and they travel to different countries around the world and facing to new adventure , they are heroes and they should safe the world and defeat the viruses. This game is also kind of shooter game, heroes using sanitizer to defeat the viruses. Each mission, you have to struggle with different unpredictable challenges and obstacles. Also this adventure game will familiarize you with each country's symbol.

Features :
+ Classic gameplay
+ Simple yet beautiful graphics
+ Easy and intuitive controls
+ Suitable for all ages

This is a free game it has excellent graphical environment. We invite you all game lovers to play this existing game. 
Enjoying your time is our desire.
